name: ICM.RUN
description: ICM (Internet Capital Markets) reimagines fundraising by letting anyone launch and trade tokenized projects directly on-chain. Instead of relying on VCs or banks, ideas, startups, or even memes can raise capital through tokens priced via bonding curves. With 24/7 global access, creators earn fees, investors gain liquidity, and markets evolve transparently, reshaping capital formation for the internet age.
